content: <rdf:RDF xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:dcat="http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#" xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/">   <dcat:Dataset rdf:about="https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/afsis-modis-collection-vegetation-indices-april-2014">     <owl:sameAs rdf:resource="urn:uuid:4a223274-eb97-4d8c-9834-4e0257bd8261"></owl:sameAs>     <dct:description>The Africa Soil Information Service (AfSIS) Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) Collection's Vegetation Indices data set contains rasters with the following calculations: time series average and time series monthly average for the Enhanced Vegetation Index (EVI), Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI), Red Reflectance Band 1, Near-Infrared Reflectance Band 2, Blue Reflectance Band 3, and Mid-Infrared Reflectance Band 7. These Africa continent-wide calculations for vegetation indices and surface reflectances use data from the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) MODIS MOD13Q1 product. The rasters have a 16-day temporal resolution, a spatial resolution of 250 meters, and are updated quarterly by AfSIS using data provided by the Columbia University International Research Institute for Climate and Society (IRI) at http://iridl.ldeo.columbia.edu.</dct:description>         <dcat:keyword>AfSIS</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Africa Soil</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Blue Reflectance</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Ecological Dynamics</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Enhanced Vegetation Index</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Land Processes</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Land Productivity</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>MIR</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>MODIS</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>NDVI</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>NIR</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Normalized Difference Vegetation Index</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Red Reflectance</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Remote Sensing</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Satellite Imagery</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Soils</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Topographic and Land Characteristics</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>Vegetation Indices</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>WWHGD</dcat:keyword>     <foaf:homepage
